procedures.title: Basic Equipment Maintenance
steps: Turn off the equipment and unplug it.
Remove any dust from the external surface.
Check for any visible damage to the cords.
Ensure the filters are clean.
Plug in the equipment and test for smooth operation.

procedures.title: Safety Check for Workplace
steps: Ensure all exits are unblocked.
Test fire alarms and sprinklers.
Check the emergency lighting systems.
Ensure first aid kits are stocked.

procedures.title: Calibration of Scales
steps: Turn on the scale and let it warm up.
Place a known weight on the scale.
Adjust the scale until it reads the correct weight.
Record the calibration results.

procedures.title: Diagnostics for Electrical Systems
steps: Turn off the main power supply.
Use a multimeter to check the voltage.
Inspect the wiring for damage or wear.
Reset the circuit breaker after the inspection.

procedures.title: Repair of Air Conditioning Unit
steps: Turn off the air conditioning unit from the main power supply.
Open the unit and check the filters and coils.
Replace any broken or damaged components.
Turn on the unit and check for proper operation.
